answer: The electronic properties of thick metallic silver films deposited on Si(111)-(7x7) substrates at room temperature exhibit a sixfold symmetry instead of the expected threefold symmetry, as seen in cond-mat/0104186.
explanation: This paper directly studies the electronic properties of silver films on Si(111)-(7x7) substrates, making it the most relevant to the question.
evidence_quote: Thick metallic silver films have been deposited onto Si(111)-(7x7) substrates
